Image.Name: i_landPV
Image.OnClickCode: zero_Interface.f_setInfoText(i_landPV, zero_Interface.v_infoText.landPV, i_landPV.getX() + uI_Tabs.v_presentationXOffset, i_landPV.getY() + uI_Tabs.v_presentationYOffset);

Image.Name: i_landWind
Image.OnClickCode: zero_Interface.f_setInfoText(i_landWind, zero_Interface.v_infoText.landWind, i_landWind.getX() + uI_Tabs.v_presentationXOffset, i_landWind.getY() + uI_Tabs.v_presentationYOffset);

Image.Name: i_householdPublicChargersV1G
Image.OnClickCode: zero_Interface.f_setInfoText(i_householdPublicChargersV1G, zero_Interface.v_infoText.householdPublicParkingV1G, i_householdPublicChargersV1G.getX() + gr_settingsV1G.getX() + uI_Tabs.v_presentationXOffset, i_householdPublicChargersV1G.getY() + gr_settingsV1G.getY() + uI_Tabs.v_presentationYOffset);

Image.Name: i_householdPublicChargersV2G
